DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether combination ketamine plus electroconvulsive therapy improve depressive symptom decrease cognitive side effect .
DOC.detailed_description: This study compare clinical response brief pulse ECT infusion ketamine 0.5 mg/kg versus brief pulse electroconvulsive therapy infusion placebo ( saline ) major depression . We also compare level cognitive impairment among group , compare level quality life among group , compare level BDNF among group . We also study level 25-hydroxyvitamin D associate cognitive impairment subject undergoing ECT .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Patients unipolar bipolar depression The Psychiatric Unit Hospital de Clinicas de Porto Alegre ( diagnosis establish Structured Clinical Interview DSMIV Axis I ) Exclusion criterion : Patients dementia History addiction / abuse psychoactive drug Other psychiatric diagnosis Refusal follow study .
